subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=たい
|kanon=たい
|toon=つい<つゐ
|kun=あいて-<あひて-, こた-える<こた-へる, そろ-い<そろ-ひ, つれあ-い<つれあ-ひ, なら-ぶ, む-かう<む-かふ
|nanori=つし
}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* Most dictionaries do not have "つゐ" as a historical reading for 対. According to historical data, the tōon-reading of 対 is the modern "つい". However, the Dai Kanwa Jiten has "つゐ" and related -ゐ historical on-readings.
{{attention|ja|please confirm this, this is translated from the Japanese Wikipedia}}
